passive.name: Defiant Till Death
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses their Basic ATK, they will gain 1 stack of Dragon's Call, lasting for {{2}} turns. Each stack of Dragon's Call increases the wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and Energy Regeneration Rate by <orangeStrong>{{5, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>. Dragon's Call can be stacked up to {{3}} times.
